article_title: Obama’s Game of Chicken with the Supreme Court

article_metadata.description: Jeffery Toobin on King v. Burwell. If it loses in the Supreme Court, the political pain will fall almost exclusively on Obama and Democrats.

og.description: If the Obama Administration loses in the Supreme Court, the political pain will fall almost exclusively on the President and Democrats.
